Ubomi kwidolophu encinci bunemvakalelo yayo ekhethekileyo, ehlanganisa ubulula kunye nobuhle obungapheliyo. Emini, izinto ziqala ngoloyiko oluhle lweentaka kunye nokuthula kokuphinda-phinda kwemisebenzi yemihla ngemihla. Iindawo zithokozisa xa umphosa evula iminyango yakhe kwaye ivumela iphunga lebread elitsha eliphekwe kwi-air. Iingane ziqhuba kumabhayisikili azo, uye uthando lwehlekiso luhlala kwiindawo ezithule. Emarikeni yendawo, abathengisi badibana ngezihlekiso zokuthakazelela ngelixa bequlunqa imiboniso yeziqhamo, imifuno kunye neemveliso ezenziwe ngesandla. Oozinzo bema phantsi ukuze bahlale behlalisana, bexoxa iindaba kunye neentsomi ezixhumanisa uluntu. Njengokuba usuku luhlala, ukukhanya kwelanga kudansa phakathi kweemithi ephakamileyo, kutyholwa imifanekiso yeempendulo zomphakathi. Ubusuku bufika kwaye buthule, umphosa uphume kumda wokugcina ubonisa imihlaba ye-orange kunye ne-pink.
